projects.title: Silhouette
projects.description: For my final year of A-level Media Studies my team and I were tasked with producing a trailer for a horror film. I was in the position of director of cinematography as well as the camera operator.

projects.title: Duty Calls
projects.description: In first year Media Studies A-level we were assigned to produce the first 2 minutes of a film. For this assignment, I was a co-director and camera operator.

projects.title: Finest Day
projects.description: For this assignment, we were tasked with conveying native through a table top and objects.

projects.title: The Deal
projects.description: In this simple video, we were experimenting with camera angles and shots.
